caption.title: A map of predicted connections among GO terms based on the analysis of differentially expressed genes in lesional lung tissue (LL) vs lung tissue without lesions (LN) is shown.
caption.p: Gene ontology enrichment analysis of differentially expressed genes (p<0.05) in each treatment group was conducted and results were visualized as a map of predicted connections among significantly enriched GO terms with Kappa threshold of 0.4.
